title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: The Project Properties Info page uses text fields instead of labels for displaying information. This causes the page to look bad on all motif platforms.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should use labels instead of text fields. This will improve the appearance of the page on all motif platforms.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a project, right-click and choose Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.)
